await tx.getAllTransactions()
await tx.getTransactionCount()
await tx.addToBlockchain(receiver.address, 100, "Hey! First real tx!")

const tx = await Transactions.attach("0x5fbdb2315678afecb367f032d93f642f64180aa3")
